name: Claude Bio Research
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's bio research knowledge work plugin
long_description: This agent helps research teams explore biomedical questions by turning complex literature and data-context into concise, actionable summaries that support hypothesis framing and evidence-oriented analysis. Users can ask it to synthesize scientific context across topics like single-cell RNA quality control, computational tool development, and experimental problem selection to accelerate decision-making and prioritize next steps. It can assist with designing workflows, interpreting instrument-derived data, and translating technical findings into clear recommendations for experiments or analyses. The agent is intended to streamline collaborative research planning and improve the clarity and focus of research agendas.
